name: TRG Converge
description:
A small Bitsy game about buying milk, being triggered, and reliving memories.

Trigger warnings: Religious bigotry, health issues, and romantic rejection.

2020-09-27 Note: It is version 0.99999 in order to meet game jam deadlines. Some bugs or small errors may still exist. Expect a new version in the future that will fix any remaining issues.
